snippet.title: Disgaea 4 Complete+ - E3 Announcement Trailer (Nintendo Switch, PS4)
snippet.description:
Preorder now: https://disgaea.us/d4-complete/purchase/
Find out more @ https://disgaea.us/d4-complete/

When the ruling powers of Hades are revealed to be corrupt, Valvatorez must spark a rebellion to bring them down! Armed to the teeth with dynamic, over-the-top gameplay and a horde of special features, this is the ultimate Disgaea!

Disgaea 4 Complete+ revisits this strategy RPG classic with all the additional scenario, characters and DLC ever released for the title and adds brand new tweaks and functionality to make it THE ULTIMATE Disgaea experience. Launching this fall for PlayStation 4 and Nintendo Switch.
